text:
Anybody has specially influence me for my studies, it was an evidence for me doing a job for help others. It's just, seeing bad teachers, I want to be a good teacher for the futur generation. I love children, being with them and learn them new knowledge. I prefer be a school master with little pupils because we teach them most important knowledge than in highschool for exemple, children will remember you during the rest of their lives, you will be useful for them, you will learn them to read, write, and thinking form themselves. It's very imortant if you want that the next generation will act for the planet for exemple, you need to transmit them passions, reasons of live and reasons of fight for a just cause.
In 2017, I made a stage in a primary school and I loved it, but it was not a good mistress at my eyes, so I tried again in 2021 and it was fantastic, I want to be a teacher like the mistress with who I was. It's now an evidence for me, I really want to learn with children, so I passed my BAFA, for working in " accueil de loisirs" or making camps with them, discover an other aspect of the relation with children. I love this aspect too, so I don't really know what I will do in the future, but I think I will be a school master for the holidays sure.
Actually, all the mondays, I'm going in a class but the school master is really bad, it reinforce my vocation and I hope I will be a good, interesant and cool master for the children.
I had just 20 mintues for writing this text so I can't write more, sorry and goodbye, have a nice day.
